metadata.title: CVE-2020-25412 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: com_line() in command.c in gnuplot 5.4 leads to an out-of-bounds-write fromstrncpy() that may lead to arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: gnuplot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
